00027 #include "Header.h"
00028 #include <iostream>

00031 #define BINARY_HEADER 0

00034 Header::Header() {
00035 }

00050 Header::Header(int pars, int mapp, int sep, int enc, int nsub, int npred,
00051         int nobj, int nsh, int ntrip, int nlit, int nent) {
00052     parsing = pars;
00053     mapping = mapp;
00054     d_separator = sep;
00055     t_encoding = enc;
00056     nsubjects = nsub;
00057     npredicates = npred;
00058     nobjects = nobj;
00059     ssubobj = nsh;
00060     ntriples = ntrip;
00061     nliterals = nlit;
00062     nentries = nent;
00063 }
00064 
00069 void Header::write(string path) {
00070     string output = path;
00071 
00072 #if BINARY_HEADER
00073     FILE *header = fopen((output.append(".hdt.header")).c_str(), "w+");
00074 
00075     // Graph parsing
00076     fwrite(&parsing,INT32,1,header);
00077     // Dictionary mapping
00078     fwrite(&mapping,INT32,1,header);
00079     // Dictionary separator
00080     fwrite(&d_separator,INT32,1,header);
00081     // Triples encoding
00082     fwrite(&t_encoding,INT32,1,header);
00083 
00084     // Statistics from the Dictionary
00085     fwrite(&nsubjects,INT32,1,header);
00086     fwrite(&npredicates,INT32,1,header);
00087     fwrite(&nobjects,INT32,1,header);
00088     fwrite(&ssubobj,INT32,1,header);
00089 
00090     // Triples in the dataset
00091     fwrite(&ntriples,INT32,1,header);
00092 
00093     fclose(header);
00094 #else
00095     ofstream headerfile((output.append(".hdt.header")).c_str());
00096 
00097     headerfile << "Parsing: " << parsing << endl << "Mapping: " << mapping
00098             << endl << "Separator: " << d_separator << endl << "Encoding: "
00099             << t_encoding << endl << "NSubjects: " << nsubjects << endl
00100             << "NPredicates: " << npredicates << endl << "NObjects: "
00101             << nobjects << endl << "NShared: " << ssubobj << endl
00102             << "Triples: " << ntriples << endl << "NLiterals: " << nliterals
00103             << endl << "Nentries: " << nentries << endl;
00104 
00105     headerfile.close();
00106 #endif
00107 }
00108 
00113 void Header::read(string path) {
00114     string output = path;
00115 
00116 #if BINARY_HEADER
00117     FILE *header = fopen((output.append(".hdt.header")).c_str(), "r");
00118 
00119     if (header==NULL) {
00120         cout << "Exception while reading Header in "<<output<<".\n";
00121         exit(1);
00122     }
00123     size_t t = 0;
00124 
00125     // Graph parsing
00126     t += fread(&parsing,INT32,1,header);
00127     // Dictionary mapping
00128     t += fread(&mapping,INT32,1,header);
00129     // Dictionary separator
00130     t += fread(&d_separator,INT32,1,header);
00131     // Triples encoding
00132     t += fread(&t_encoding,INT32,1,header);
00133 
00134     // Dictionary stats
00135     t += fread(&nsubjects,INT32,1,header);
00136     // Dictionary mapping
00137     t += fread(&npredicates,INT32,1,header);
00138     // Dictionary separator
00139     t += fread(&nobjects,INT32,1,header);
00140     // Triples encoding
00141     t += fread(&ssubobj,INT32,1,header);
00142 
00143     // Triples in the dataset
00144     t += fread(&ntriples,INT32,1,header);
00145 
00146     if (t != 9)
00147     {
00148         cout << "   <ERROR> Errors in Header" << endl;
00149         exit(1);
00150     }
00151 
00152     fclose(header);
00153 #else
00154     try {
00155         ifstream headerfile((output.append(".hdt.header")).c_str());
00156 
00157         if (headerfile.good()) {
00158             string line;
00159 
00160             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00161             headerfile >> parsing;
00162 
00163             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00164             headerfile >> mapping;
00165 
00166             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00167             headerfile >> d_separator;
00168 
00169             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00170             headerfile >> t_encoding;
00171 
00172             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00173             headerfile >> nsubjects;
00174 
00175             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00176             headerfile >> npredicates;
00177 
00178             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00179             headerfile >> nobjects;
00180 
00181             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00182             headerfile >> ssubobj;
00183 
00184             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00185             headerfile >> ntriples;
00186 
00187             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00188             headerfile >> nliterals;
00189 
00190             getline(headerfile, line, ' ');
00191             headerfile >> nentries;
00192         }
00193 
00194         headerfile.close();
00195     } catch (const ios::failure &problem) {
00196         // Something really went wrong here
00197         cout << "Error reading header " << problem.what();
00198     }
00199 #endif
00200 }
